Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 10 lines of text on the recto and further 3 lines on the verso containing an instruction to tan fur or animal skin .
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (287-290, pl.41)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82904) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82904)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 38 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
